task_title: Review Phase 3: US1 Config-Driven Test Setup (T018-T027)
task_requirements:
Review the Config System module implementation for ARTK Core v1.

**Files to Review:**
- core/typescript/config/types.ts - TypeScript interfaces for all config sections
- core/typescript/config/defaults.ts - Default values for optional fields
- core/typescript/config/schema.ts - Zod validation schemas
- core/typescript/config/env.ts - Environment variable resolver
- core/typescript/config/loader.ts - YAML config loader with validation
- core/typescript/config/index.ts - Module barrel export
- core/typescript/config/__tests__/*.test.ts - Unit tests

**Validation Criteria:**
- Types match data-model.md sections 1.1-1.14
- FR-001: Loads from artk/artk.config.yml
- FR-002: Validates against schema with field path errors
- FR-003: Resolves ${VAR} and ${VAR:-default} syntax
- FR-004: Supports named environments via ARTK_ENV
- FR-005: Typed access to all config sections
- All 124 unit tests passing
